title: Tour de France ticker: Sam Bennett overlooked at Bora-Hansgrohe, Renshaw tapped to help Cavendish, 60,000 ‘ikurriñas’ to line roads
content:
Follow all the Tour de France hype ahead of the Bilbao 'grand départ' on July 1.

Read the full article at Tour de France ticker: Sam Bennett overlooked at Bora-Hansgrohe, Renshaw tapped to help Cavendish, 60,000 ‘ikurriñas’ to line roads on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
